  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CheckpointManager  
    CheckpointManager.CheckpointComponentMetadata
    This message encapsulates the info associated with checkpoint metadata of a component
    CheckpointManager.CheckpointComponentMetadata.Builder
    This message encapsulates the info associated with checkpoint metadata of a component
    CheckpointManager.CleanStatefulCheckpointRequest
    Message sent by tmanager to ckptmgr to cleanup old checkpoint state.
    CheckpointManager.CleanStatefulCheckpointRequest.Builder
    Message sent by tmanager to ckptmgr to cleanup old checkpoint state.
    CheckpointManager.CleanStatefulCheckpointResponse
    Message sent by ckptmgr to tmanager about the cleanup request
    CheckpointManager.CleanStatefulCheckpointResponse.Builder
    Message sent by ckptmgr to tmanager about the cleanup request
    CheckpointManager.DownstreamStatefulCheckpoint
    Once stmgr receives StoreInstanceStateCheckpoint from an instance, it sends this message to all of that instance's downstream components' stmgrs to propagate the checkpoint marker
    CheckpointManager.DownstreamStatefulCheckpoint.Builder
    Once stmgr receives StoreInstanceStateCheckpoint from an instance, it sends this message to all of that instance's downstream components' stmgrs to propagate the checkpoint marker
    CheckpointManager.GetInstanceStateRequest
    This is the request that StMgr sends to Checkpoint Mgr to fetch the instance state data
    CheckpointManager.GetInstanceStateRequest.Builder
    This is the request that StMgr sends to Checkpoint Mgr to fetch the instance state data
    CheckpointManager.GetInstanceStateResponse
    This is the response that Checkpoint Mgr sends to StMgr for its get instance state request
    CheckpointManager.GetInstanceStateResponse.Builder
    This is the response that Checkpoint Mgr sends to StMgr for its get instance state request
    CheckpointManager.InitiateStatefulCheckpoint
    This is the message that the stmgr sends to its local tasks to begin initiating checkpoint
    CheckpointManager.InitiateStatefulCheckpoint.Builder
    This is the message that the stmgr sends to its local tasks to begin initiating checkpoint
    CheckpointManager.InstanceStateCheckpoint
    This message encapsulates the info associated with state of an instance/partition.
    CheckpointManager.InstanceStateCheckpoint.Builder
    This message encapsulates the info associated with state of an instance/partition.
    CheckpointManager.InstanceStateStored
    Message sent by stmgr to tmanager informing it about the fact that we stored a checkpoint belonging to the instance
    CheckpointManager.InstanceStateStored.Builder
    Message sent by stmgr to tmanager informing it about the fact that we stored a checkpoint belonging to the instance
    CheckpointManager.RegisterStMgrRequest
    This is the message that a stmgr sends when it wants to register itself with the checkpoint manager
    CheckpointManager.RegisterStMgrRequest.Builder
    This is the message that a stmgr sends when it wants to register itself with the checkpoint manager
    CheckpointManager.RegisterStMgrResponse
    This is the message that checkpoint manager sends when it receives the register request from stmgr
    CheckpointManager.RegisterStMgrResponse.Builder
    This is the message that checkpoint manager sends when it receives the register request from stmgr
    CheckpointManager.RegisterTManagerRequest
    This is the message that a tmanager sends when it wants to register itself with checkpoint manager
    CheckpointManager.RegisterTManagerRequest.Builder
    This is the message that a tmanager sends when it wants to register itself with checkpoint manager
    CheckpointManager.RegisterTManagerResponse
    This is the message that checkpoint manager sends when it receives the register request from tmanager
    CheckpointManager.RegisterTManagerResponse.Builder
    This is the message that checkpoint manager sends when it receives the register request from tmanager
    CheckpointManager.ResetTopologyState
    Message sent by stmgr to tmanager asking it to reset the topology to some valid checkpoint.
    CheckpointManager.ResetTopologyState.Builder
    Message sent by stmgr to tmanager asking it to reset the topology to some valid checkpoint.
    CheckpointManager.RestoreInstanceStateRequest
    This is the message that stmgr sends to its instance asking them to restore their state
    CheckpointManager.RestoreInstanceStateRequest.Builder
    This is the message that stmgr sends to its instance asking them to restore their state
    CheckpointManager.RestoreInstanceStateResponse
    This is the message that instance sends to its stmgr when done with restoring the state
    CheckpointManager.RestoreInstanceStateResponse.Builder
    This is the message that instance sends to its stmgr when done with restoring the state
    CheckpointManager.RestoreTopologyStateRequest
    Message sent by tmanager to stmgr asking them to reset their instances to this checkpoint
    CheckpointManager.RestoreTopologyStateRequest.Builder
    Message sent by tmanager to stmgr asking them to reset their instances to this checkpoint
    CheckpointManager.RestoreTopologyStateResponse
    Message that stmgr sends to tmanager after it restores all of its local instances to a checkpoint_id
    CheckpointManager.RestoreTopologyStateResponse.Builder
    Message that stmgr sends to tmanager after it restores all of its local instances to a checkpoint_id
    CheckpointManager.SaveInstanceStateRequest
    This is the request that StMgr sends to Checkpoint Mgr to store instance checkpoint data
    CheckpointManager.SaveInstanceStateRequest.Builder
    This is the request that StMgr sends to Checkpoint Mgr to store instance checkpoint data
    CheckpointManager.SaveInstanceStateResponse
    After successfully saving state, this is what Checkpoint Mgr sends back as response
    CheckpointManager.SaveInstanceStateResponse.Builder
    After successfully saving state, this is what Checkpoint Mgr sends back as response
    CheckpointManager.StartInstanceStatefulProcessing
    Message sent by stmgr to Instance to start processing This is related to StartStmgrStatefulProcessing message above but between stmgr -> instance.
    CheckpointManager.StartInstanceStatefulProcessing.Builder
    Message sent by stmgr to Instance to start processing This is related to StartStmgrStatefulProcessing message above but between stmgr -> instance.
    CheckpointManager.StartStatefulCheckpoint
    Message sent to stmgrs by the tmanager to initiate checkpointing
    CheckpointManager.StartStatefulCheckpoint.Builder
    Message sent to stmgrs by the tmanager to initiate checkpointing
    CheckpointManager.StartStmgrStatefulProcessing
    Message sent by tmanager to stmgr to start processing For stateful processing, all the topology components should be rolled back to a consistent state before they can start processing.
    CheckpointManager.StartStmgrStatefulProcessing.Builder
    Message sent by tmanager to stmgr to start processing For stateful processing, all the topology components should be rolled back to a consistent state before they can start processing.
    CheckpointManager.StatefulConsistentCheckpoint
    Message representing information about a globally consistent checkpoint
    CheckpointManager.StatefulConsistentCheckpoint.Builder
    Message representing information about a globally consistent checkpoint
    CheckpointManager.StatefulConsistentCheckpoints
    message stored in the state manager by the tmanager
    CheckpointManager.StatefulConsistentCheckpoints.Builder
    message stored in the state manager by the tmanager
    CheckpointManager.StatefulConsistentCheckpointSaved
    Message broadcasted to stmgr (will then be forwarded to instances) after when checkpoint becomes "globally consistent"
    CheckpointManager.StatefulConsistentCheckpointSaved.Builder
    Message broadcasted to stmgr (will then be forwarded to instances) after when checkpoint becomes "globally consistent"
    CheckpointManager.StoreInstanceStateCheckpoint
    This is the message that the instance sends when it wants stmgr to store its state
    CheckpointManager.StoreInstanceStateCheckpoint.Builder
    This is the message that the instance sends when it wants stmgr to store its state
